group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:What I now pen is the@last story of this volume...]
[textBlack:In this tale, the conclusion,@various Magical Girls gathered@together and converged,@both as groups and as individuals.]
[textBlack:At the time, I was about to be@discharged from the hospital,@following Urara's own release.]
[textBlack:Although I hadn't recovered completely yet,@thanks to the magic from Rii@and the Magical Girls of Futatsugi@I was able to be discharged quite quickly,@relative to my injuries.]
[textBlack:The words Urara spoke to me,@that the Professor has already@given up on saving them, have been@swirling around in my head ever since.]

[textBlack:I wonder if spreading the word@about Magical Girls really will@lead to a tragedy for everyone...@And while wondering about these questions,@the faces of all the Magical Girls@I've crossed paths with come to mind,@and it feels wrong to lay down my pen.]
[textBlack:Thus, I find myself fretting over@the uncertainty of the future.]
[textBlack:The shock of hearing that the@Magical Girls have been divided in two,@and of seeing Touka and Nemu@make their gamble right before my eyes...]

group_1.textLeft: So, 'bout that energy. 'Been doin'@research on my end, but...
Even with a li'l turmoil, I ain't hopin' for a lot.
Tried firin' up the East-West thing,@but d'nno if it amounted t' much.

group_1.textRight: The goal was to produce energy by@having girls clash with each other.
In line with that policy, you made the correct choice.

group_1.textLeft: Th' problem's how it turned out.

group_1.textRight: Unfortunately, compared to the energy of@Witchification,
The magnitude of the phase transition between@hope and despair is just too small.

group_1.textLeft: So, since you worked all that out...
Plannin' on leavin' things with@everyone all pal'in 'round?

group_1.textRight: I see, so they haven't contacted you yet.
They're expected to stir things up a bit more.

group_1.textLeft: I don' reckon they'll kick up the@fuss you think they will.
'Less, o'course, someone's changed their@mind since th' last time I peeked in.
'sides, it won't make a difference even if'n@they do get the Purification System.

group_1.textRight: Nor am I simply sitting idle.
Depending on how it's used, the Automatic@Purification System still retains some utility.

group_1.textLeft: If'n Kagome becomes a Magical Girl,
reckon you won't be needin' that research no more.

group_1.textRight: As far as Kagome Satori goes, it should be@fine to continue observing for now.
The more time passes, the more@karma she entwines herself in.

group_1.textLeft: I see. So we'll build her up a li'l longer, then.
The real fly 'n th' ointment's that@Princess from the Neo-Magius.
Ain't got no notion what's goin'@through that girl's mind...
